definitions.text: teach or refine to be discriminative in taste or judgment
examples: She is well schooled in poetry

definitions.text: raise from a barbaric to a civilized state
examples: The wild child found wandering in the forest was gradually civilized

definitions.text: having a high state of culture and development both social and technological
examples: terrorist acts that shocked the civilized world

definitions.text: marked by refinement in taste and manners
